content.detailedDescription:
Witness was on her way home to breckenridge, colorado from greeley, colorado.
she was traveling on highway i-25 and just passed the longmont/boulder exit.
something caught her eye in the sky and she looked up and saw a disc shaped craft houvering just slightly east of hwy i-25.  as she watched, the craft suddenly flew at a high rate of speed approximately 20 miles to the east then stopped and houvered for a few minutes then flew back at where the witness first noticed the craft.  the craft again houvered for a few minutes and again flew to the east at a high rate of speed approximately 20 miles,  houvered again for a few minutes and then flew back a second time to where she first noticed the craft.  she then watched it for approximately two minutes and then it disappeared from view in an instant.
content.summary: Watched disc houver over i-25 at longmont/boulder exit then fly east and back twice before disappearing

content.detailedDescription: My friend and second witness to this event (who wishes to remain totally anonymous) and i were taking some pictures after dark in the allenwood gamelands with my new digital camera.  on our way out, at exactly 9:15 pm, i decided to test the dis mode on the camera (compensates for movement and takes a more still picture).  from the passenger side of the truck at 15 mph, i held my arm out, bottom of the camera towards the front of the truck, top facing the back.  held it up above the trucks mirror and away from the windshield, and snapped a picture of the branches overhanging the road.  when i pulled the camera back in i saw this picture and immediately we stopped the truck, got out, and looked all around for a few minutes for anything in the sky that would have made this image.  it was a perfectly clear night, with no airplanes in the sky.  we tried to recreate this picture by taking pictures of the few stars that were out with no luck, all the pictures came out black.  the picture shows the branch of the tree perfectly still, with the 4 lighted objects apparently moving at a very high rate of speed from right to left, horizontally to the direction we were traveling in the truck.
content.summary: Streaking lights

content.detailedDescription:
I am a member of il. mufon and an investigator, both for mufon and the state of il.  i purchased a bike in reno on monday 7/27/09, and was driving it back to st. louis on i-80, on monday night.  i had just crossed over the utah border and saw the bonneville salt flats exit sign on i-80.  the wind was blowing about 30 knots, which caused my bike to lean as i drove at about 80 miles per hour. it was dark, very few if any clouds, dry and the conditions were nominal except for the tremendous wind from the north blowing southward. i was also wearing a helmet, full face.
i was looking up at all the stars and the blinking lights of many planes traversing the sky as i drove in the darkness. a white light then appeared to my right (south) at very high altitude at about my 40 degree position.  i estimate the altitude and distance to be 15,000 feet at 10 to 15 miles out. when it shown its light, it appeared to be a plan with running lights, breaking through the clouds--in other words, it had a halo effect.
i dismissed this as a plane, even though there were very few clouds directly above me; however, at that distance, there could have been more clouds.  as i drove, the ultra bright white light descended and was moving fast towards me.  about 2 minutes later, the light appeared again, altitude, much lower and much closer than before, maybe 8 to 10 miles. this kept happening about every 2 to 3 minutes, the light would power up, shine in my direction, then slowly turn off, as if were a river barge light. it didn't just switch off, it quickly phased down. i kept looking back thinking that the light should eventually cross the road behind me since it was on a 90 degree angle to me and heading in my direction.  at some point, i should have traveled east of it's trajectory to the north since we were on a perpendicular course.  but that never happened.  the light lit up about 6 to 7 times, each time, closer, brighter, lower and especially disturbing, always in the same 40 degree position as when i first viewed it.  logically, that meant that the light was keeping pace with me, which was very disturbing to me, but i was never afraid, just extremely compelled to continue to look on that same heading of south, south-east. i couldn't decide which was more interesting, the fact that it was getting closer to me, or the fact that it was always in the same position to me.  after about 6 events of the light turning on and then off, duration each time being about 3 to 5 seconds, it then was at it's closest point to me, about 1 mile.  what happened next was absolutely fascinating and the even then caused me to dismiss my assumption of an airplane or helicopter and/or the characteristics of a man made craft that i had ever seen before.  the second to the last time of this close encounter the light shown at me, very close, one mile and this time it continued to stay on.  one to two seconds later, two other lights to its left came on along with it, same luminosity, same distance, moving with me but not horizontally symmetrical to each other.  they were all three equidistant to each other, but the middle one was at a higher elevation than the other two making it appear to me as a very flat pyramidal grouping of three white, brilliant, lights about 1 mile away from me.  there was never any beam of any sort and i looked to see if the white salt below became illuminated because of the lights.  it did not.  just brilliant white lights off to my 40 to 45 degrees each time.  at the closest point to me, i estimate the altitude to now be about 600 to 1,000 feet at a distance of no more than 1 mile from me, if even that.
the three lights then all turned off at the same time, vaporising down, like a river barge's lights.  i now figured that these lights were directly pointing at me, why i don't know.  i felt that this was now a personal experience i was having and not just random lights.  there was too much evidence of this for me to dismiss it now.  i always saw stars in the background as if these lights were not a part of any craft or solid object.  they appeared independent of each other but uniformly symmetrical in their formation, except for the slightly flattened pyramidal characteristic described above.  
the last time it shown on me was amazing!  that same single light appeared one last time, same heading to me, same distance and same altitude as before.  from a distance of about half a mile away i saw what looked like lcd, brilliant orangish/reddish, lights scrolling from way behind the light, to the left in a huge circle and as it came around the circle, i could see more of the colored light, exactly as if it were and vegas lcd scrolling around the circumference of a huge, circular disk.  about 6 to 10 of these very fast pulsations of colored light came from the exact same spot way behind the light, circled around a huge disk shaped object and came in to full view to me and ended at the light that was still showing at me.  this was one giant pulse of about 6 to 8 individual scrolling lights which made the outline of a circular disk.  but the disk was on a tilt slightly, about 15 degrees, so the lights went slightly up, over and downward and then abruptly ended at the white light that had stayed on the entire time, about 10 to 12 seconds. 
i was so shocked by this......I pulled the bike over on the shoulder of the highway. the wind was so fast, it about blew it over.  i was speechless at what i had just seen and was hoping for it to appear to me again.  some time went by as i had resumed riding and the light never appeared close to me again.  however, i saw the light one more time. it had flown way off in the distance, just above the horizon, very far from me, south, where it blinked one more time as if it had lost interest in me.......And was now searching for someone else to totally freak out. 
i felt as if this thing was momentarily interested in me somehow.  it didn't seem hostile in any way.....Moreover, it seemed to want to show me that it was not a plane or helicopter that i kept insisting it was in my mind. why? i don't know. the last even, the pulsation, was absolutely beautiful.  it revealed a disk shape, 180 degrees of a half circle, in the most brilliant orange and red light i have ever seen, except a cutting torch, maybe.  i could always see stars behind it which i am now even more convinced it was cloaked, but the pulses did reveal a huge semi-circle.
i had not been driking, nor was i tired nor was i on any kind of medication or drugs of any kind.  there was no reason for my mind to be impared what-so-ever.  i know what i saw but i can't explain the reason for any of it.  question: has anyone else reported this or a similar event over the bonneville salt flats, in utah?
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Descending lights, close encounter, sphere, 3, strobe, disk.
content.locationName: Salt Lake City and Elco, , Utah

content.detailedDescription:
My brother and his roommate went out on the balcony of their apartment for a cigarette at about 11:45pm. after a few minutes outside, a bright flash caught our eyes. north-east of where we were (the balcony faces north) there was about every second or two at a constant rate there was a bright white flash, brighter than any star or planet that could be seen. this flash was traveling west-north-west -- as could be seen by the space between the locations of each flash. we watched it for a bit, and saw it start to curve in a north or north-north-westerly direction.

no other lights, such as red/green lights that are on airplanes, or any other such thing were on it. the one thing that must be pointed out, however is that this was moving at an extremely slow speed, yet there was no drift from what seemed to be the curve stated above. either this object was very high in the sky (which would make the brightness of it stand out even more), or it was at a lower altitude; at that speed, however, i doubt that it would be able to stay in air.
content.summary: Bright object brightly flashing across sky

content.detailedDescription:
I had just arrived at my mother���s house in la after driving from northern california. on the ride down i stopped first in a place called ���area 101��� where i spoke with a number of ufo enthusiasts about the contact movement���s program of interacting with the intelligence (presumably et) behind the ufo phenomenon. from there i headed south and met with a young man who described his having positive interactions with what he identified as ets throughout his life with numerous sightings that he claimed had an interactive component. after i explained to him a term that i have coined called ���prime contactee��� (reserved for individuals who can request a sighting and actually have one occur)  he thought that he definitely was a ���prime.���

at my mom���s house in koreatown i brought my luggage up to the second floor and looked out through a screen window. it was 1:45 am. the lights of the city reflecting off the overcast skies lit up the neighborhood. the silhouettes of palm trees graced the horizon. i gazed out to the west and immediately noticed a blinking stationary red light about ten degrees above the rooftops of the surrounding two story homes. 

for many years i have looked through that window on visits to la and can never recall seeing such a light in the sky before. it was difficult to judge its distance as there were no landmarks behind it. it was relatively large, about a finger breaths wide at arms full length. in trying to figure our what it was my first thought was of  flashing red lights on a radio antennae array some 3 miles to the west.  they are not visible from my mom���s house and besides this light was solitary and far too large. as i had this thought the light began to slowly move horizontally to the north. this was no stationary aircraft beacon sitting on an antenna. police helicopters routinely patrol this part of central la and the light was not part of any fixed or rotating wing aircraft. at this late hours all was quiet in  this heavily residential neighborhood. the red pulsating object, circular in shape moved behind a tree. i waited for it to emerge into view on the other side. it did not. i waited and scanned the sky and listened intently for the sound of aircraft. none  could be was heard. 
was this just another "random sighting?" or could it have been a consciousness mediated show of support for my networking efforts among the ufo experiencers that i like to call "the contact underground?" my guess is that it was a show of support because the next day i got a call from a contact team leader who told me that her skywatch team had a sighting of a round red ufo at midnight the previous night. it was less than two hours before my sighting. coincidence? perhaps but i don't think so!
content.summary: Red light going on and off seen above the neighborhood. totally silent and when first seen was stationary. the started to move horizontally in the north slowly north

content.detailedDescription:
My fiance and i were sitting on the couch watching a movie, then got up to take the dogs outside when we noticed what at first glance appeared to be a helicopter descending from the sky in our neighborhood. it had two orange-ish/white flashing lights, and one that occasional flashed red. at first i thought that it was landing on or near the elementary school due south of our home in rita ranch. the school sits on a street called rees loop. 

it was immediately noted that there was no sound emanating from the object, which, if it had been a helicopter, would have been audible given our distance from the school. but there was no sound at all. i could see two flashing orange-ish/white lights and one red. we only got a quick look at the object before it descended below the line of houses and out of our view. 

we sat back down and watched another ten more minutes of the movie. then we saw the same object ascending in the same place that it originally descended. my fiance noticed it first this time, through the sliding glass door that leads to the backyard of our home from the living room. she jumped up off the couch and ran out the back door. i immediately followed. 

by the time we were outside (less than 5 seconds later) the object had begun to move slowly west/northwest, in the direction of davis mothan air force base. this was at about 11:15pm. what was noticeable this time was that it was audible. the sound was not that of a helicopter, but more of a whirring noise like that of a jet engine. but very high pitched in tone, like when a jet engine first starts. this sound stayed steady as we watched it slowly fly low over the neighborhood. we lost sight of it when it went past the roof of the neighbor's house. 

we then ran through our house and into the street out front. we again watched it move slowly across the sky, the same sound, same slow movement. we eventually lost sight of it as the view was blocked by a large tree on the north side of the street a few house to the west of us. again, there were two orange-ish/white flashing lights and one red one that could be see on the object. the lights were very bright and were not far from us at all. given the brightness of the lights, there was not way to distinguish the shape of the object.  judging from the size of the lights and their distance apart, it appeared to be far to large to be a helicopter.

after seeing it from the street out front, it was obvious that there were no propellers on top or back, and the size showed it to be far to large to have descended near the school.  past the back of the school on the south side there is desert, then old vail road, and more desert with train tracks.  a few miles further to the south lies i10.  the size, when viewed from the street, leads me to believe the area of descent was at least out near or past old vail road.
content.summary: Object was seen from backyard of home due south dropping below the line of houses.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my roof repairing my swamp cooler when i spotted a star-like white object (small dot in sky) moving in a straight line at what appeared to be a very high rate of speed.  this object covered over 100 degrees of the sky in 5-6 seconds, and must have been way higher than any commercial airplane would appear to be in the sky.  i'm not a good judge of the altitude but it was such a tiny dot of light it must have been way up there.  i witnessed no contrail or tail of whatever comes from jets flying through the sky. this object moved from east to west, and i lost sight of it only when it seemed to speed so far away to the west that it got smaller and smaller until it disappeared.  there was no noise or any other phenomenon associated with this sighting that i can report.  i was so amazed by how fast it seemed to move, i am no expert on these things but i judged it's travel through the sky by imagining the entire sky as 180 degrees of the whole earths 360 degrees of a circle, then estimating from where i first saw the object to the east and then lost sight of it to the west.  i don't know what a super-sonic military jet would look like if it were to take the same kind of path though the sky in front of me, but i've never seen an object move that fast though the sky except maybe when i saw the space station move though the dusk sky from the south west to the north east last year.  i think the object i saw in this report appeared to moved even faster than the space station travel i witnessed then.
content.summary: Daylight observation of star-like white object moving across sky at very high rate of speed/high altitude

content.detailedDescription:
it has been around 12 years since we saw it. i will try one more time to explain it for mufon. you see i first documented my sighting on a different website, but have yet to examine a closley simular encounter on the same or near date as the night we saw it in that area. it was truly scary.
   on july 5th @ around 1am in the morning i saw a greenish light in the sky just above the coastal range. we were camping at the same place we've camped for 10 years plus. it is located near the dunes approx 15 mins walk to the ocean.                                                                 
   my husband had just put on the last couple of logs for the goodnight fire. i then asked him if he saw the greenish lights. well it so happend that by the time he even looked, the lights they were way more defined.
   
   as in> there was a quite bright light in front of the object that was the tip of it. and it was turning more of a bluish color in the what seemed to be the total of the triangluar shape. he then began to shine a very bright light at it.

   it then began to come even closer to us. by this time i was soooo frightened by the defined sight of it .

    it was a translusint type color of bluish/green in the middle of each bright light that the triangle consisted of. the front one being the brightest. 

    there was only a low hhuummiinng sound as it went so very slightly from right to left as if it was surveying the lake, dunesand land or somthing
content.summary: Quite large bluish/green pure triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
Tonight, july 30th, 2009: my wife and i were in the back yard. and as usual we were looking  at the stars. we noticed a bright circluar object traveling from west to east. it was not blinking like a passenger jet or a personal airplane. this object traveled almost in a straight line, thought it did move up and down. the light did not blink like a passener jet or a private airplane. 

as we watched the circlular light travel from west to east, suddenly it got really bright and discharged a bright light to the southwest. once the other light was out of sight, the orignial object dimmed into nothingness. 

from years of star gazing, living near multiple airports, i and my wife know this was not a usual aircraft. 

this was the most fantastic celistial experience of our lives.  we do believe in ufos, whether man made or extraterristrial, and tonight we  know we saw an extraterristrial object.
content.summary: Bright blue light traveling  from the west to the east.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping in my room on my parents farm.  it was very early in the morning, and all through the night my dog had been barking making it very hard to sleep.  i yelled out my window numerous times to get the dog to shut up but to no avail.  normally the dog would bark at nothing but would cease after a stern scalding.  this night was different.

i finally conceded defeat and decided to go outside for a cigarette and to see what was going on.  the dog stopped barking once i got outside.  i lit my cigarette and looked out into the sky as i normally did.  the sky was starting to brighten, but it was dark enough that a few stars were still visible.  i glanced to my right, which would have been west, and noticed what looked like an orange star moving in the distance.  at first i wrote it off as a plane, but it did not have the flashing lights that i have seen many times before in the open saskatchewan night sky.  my second thought was a helicopter, but it was very quiet outside and a chopper can be heard coming from miles away.  as it moved from the west to the south it suddenly stopped, immediately dropped it's altitude, and continued heading south.  by my estimation it must have dropped fifty to one-hundred feet, and would have been about one and half to two miles away at about four-hundred to five-hundred feet in the air.  i watched it until i could no longer see it.  

the next day i told my dad, my mom, and a friend who i worked with.  a year later i told my girlfriend who i'd just started dating at the time of the incident.  i've kept it to myself until i could find a suitable place to report it.  

i've always been a firm believer in ufos.  this incident shocked the hell out of me, but it excited me even more so.  i could not take my eyes off of this object for fear of losing it.  i don't know if this is what my dog was barking about, but i'm glad she was making noise that night or i might not have witnessed this ufo passing by my parents acreage.
content.summary: Bright orange sphere glowing

content.detailedDescription:
We were waiting for our rented beach house near san felipe, we were waithin because  there was a family from usa still packing to go back,suddently some body said look at that!, i was 7 yo at that time, there were 11 people from our party, including me and 9 from our american neighbors, i looked at the mountains and i saw a neon blue light zig zaging out from the mountain, it left a trail of strange green-blue-white smoke it must have zig-zag at least a "w" and a "v" as it gained more altitude, then the neon blue light seemed to split in 3 blue lights, but they were conected by what woud seem like a laser of the same color, when they separated they formed a perfect triange and the strange green-blue-white smoke stoped, but you couldn't see the color of the sky inside the tringle,inside the triangle was the darkest black you can imagine, the spacecraft as it gained more altitude, the triangle looked smaller but the blue lights looked brighter, allmost as if the lights were becoming one again, when i couldn't see the darknes inside the triange any more, it simply disappeared.
all 20 people there saw the triangle ufo, san felipe is a very small town in baja, there are no military bases, after it was over i remember my grandfather,my dad and my uncle talking to the 2 american men that wher there, and they all agreed on one thing, that what we saw was not man made!
the american family left,and i remember that night was the windiest night i have ever seen, wee stayed for 2 days more but did not see anything more.
content.summary: It blasted off from mountains, first it was 1light, then became triangle,3lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving off the loop parkway onto lido blv west bound, between 1am and 1:15am, very light traffic.  i looked to the ocean and saw in the air, about the height of an approaching plane, an oblong shaped object that looked like the size of an airbus -- it appeared to be just beyond the beach over the water.  it had lights on either end, and a light moving from one end to the next across its entire mid-section, and a light below.  i came to realize that it didn't seem like a plane, which in long beach i see leaving and departing jfk many times.  unlike an approaching or departing plane, it remained stationary, neither taking an approach toward jfk nor ascending away.  for 2-3 minutes i kept watching it while watching the road, slowly driving westbound on lido blvd.  the object did not change position.  i lost view of it, obstructed by trees as i reached the end of the beach area of lido toward the residential area.  i circled back eastbound on lido blv toward point lookout.  the sky was empty, i could not find it where i had originally spotted it.  i went back west bound, and saw no sign of it again or thereafter.
content.summary: Stationary oval object in midair, no sound, lights flashing fro one end to the other

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning home from working at a festival. i live in chengdu, sichuan, china. i had been working outside of chengdu about 25 kilometers south of the city. i was returning home at the time of the sighting. i was riding a three wheeled electric bicycle traveling approx 10 miles per hour. i was traveling north bound. it was approx 9:00 to 9:15pm and the event lasted for approx 20 to 25 minuets. the surrounding area is a heavy traffic road with three lanes going either way, north and south. there is a meridian in between the lanes with foliage as well as foliage on the outer edges of the road.

as i was traveling home i noticed four green lights in the sky clumped together like grapes or an upside down cone with a white light to one side of it. if i had to guess or how high it was i would say approx 300 feet, but, i really have no idea on how high, but i knew it was higher than any building, yet, just below the cloud cover since there had been light rain that evening. because of the height it was too low for an airplane to be flying.

the lights caught my attention because they were of an unusual green color and they were not moving. at first i thought it might of been a helicopter but then i noticed a second set of lights to the west of the ones i first saw. the second set of lights had two green lights and a white light. the second craft would have the two green lights on then one would go off and the white light would go on. it did this through out my observations.

as i became aware that these were not any kind of aircraft that i am familiar with, i stopped my bike, turned it off and got off it and walk away from it a little to make sure nothing from my bike got in the way of what i was looking at. i kept watching the objects. at first they didn't move. then the second object moved about six inches to the south. the second object was further away, i would say approx a mile from where i was standing, where the first object might of been less than a 1/4 mile from me.

after the second object moved it started flashing the white light a lot. then the first object flashed it's white light and moved southwards very slowly and with out a sound. the second object then moved again and the first object then moved northward almost back to its' original position. again there was no sound at all.

during this time some people that were riding by, saw that i was staring upward and they stopped to look as well. some folks in a car stopped, a man took some photos and then sped away, (these were all chinese citizens). i only had my cell phone with me and sad to say that the quality of my cell camera is very poor and when i tried to see if i could photograph the objects, they would not even show up on the screen.

i stayed to watch the crafts to see what would happen. the second craft started to go downward as if it were landing. the first craft in less than a few seconds caught up to the second craft and was behind it, or so it seemed, and started flashing a lot of multicolored lights. the second craft also started flashing multicolored lights and then both crafts descended as though they were landing.

it was at this point that i lost sight of them. i stayed and watched the area for another five minuets to see maybe that they would lift back up but nothing happened. i really think they landed. i will go back tomorrow to the area where i think they went down to see if there is any trace of what happened tonight.

in closing, i feel this is important and our government needs to know about this happening here. i will go to the american consulate and report what i have just said here to them and see what happens. my thoughts on this are that what i saw was amazing. i just feel that our government will just blow me off and this will be filed 13. i will write a report tomorrow after my investigation of the area. even if these craft can be explained my concern is that we do not have anything that moves as these crafts did to my knowledge. if the chinese government has craft that can do the speeds that i witnessed then we need to take notice.

follow up:

26 july 2009. time of report is now 1:35pm

i had returned to the sighting area to see what i could find of my sightings. the weather is very rainy with dark overcast clouds. there are a lot of black government cars traveling all over the area. it seems excessive to me but then i am only guessing. i have seen a couple of gov cars where the occupants were talking to local vendors and people standing around. i am not fluent in chinese so i do not know what they are talking about, and they seem to stop talking when i approach. i dare not take my camera out to take photos.

i do manage to go to a road behind the tree line where i saw the crafts descend and there are many open fields in the area. it is very possible that the crafts could of landed in any of the many fields there. again i see gov cars ( a chinese gov car has a white plate with black lettering), around so i do not even attempt to go wandering in any of the fields where i suspect the crafts might of landed. sorry can not do more at this time, i do not know what the gov is doing here, nor do i know their attitude of these things, if indeed, that is why they are here.
content.summary: Green lights that looked like a cluster of grapes over sichuan, china

content.detailedDescription: It was a diamond shape with definate outlines glowing but darkened inside to the middle that glowed like the outline. it had a intersecting cross from the middle to the outside edge that glosed like the outline and center. from here (west midland county) it was in the northeast sky and what appeared to be miles away but was very large, 20 times what the stars in the sky were. i noticed it because it was unusual. it did not appear to move. after my dog did what she needed to do i went in the house and looked 10 minutes later and it was still there. please get back to me if others saw this or if there is a explanation. i have had a sighting in the past 40 + years ago but it was much differant.
content.summary: Glowing diamond shape

content.detailedDescription:
from the toronto sun newspaper.. july 28, 2009

did something crash in the ottawa river?

by jon willing & don wilcox, sun media

last updated: 28th july 2009, 11:59am


rescue workers search the ottawa river near the deschenes rapids this morning after reports of something crashing in the area on monday night. (errol mcgihon/sun media)

    rescue workers search the ottawa river near the deschenes rapids this morning after reports of something crashing in the area on monday night. (errol mcgihon/sun media) 

ottawa - what crashed in to the ottawa river at about 10 p.M. on monday? that is the question rescue services are trying to answer this morning as they search a stretch of water near the deschenes rapids.

dozens of witnesses are reporting they saw lights and heard a loud bang, or other noises, at about 10 p.M. some thought it might be a small plane crashing. others wonder if it was just fireworks. one witness speculates it could have been a meteorite.

their calls sent emergency crews from ottawa and gatineau racing to the area, and sparked a search which lasted several hours before being called off. this morning, crews are back on the river, including a search and rescue chopper from cfb trenton.

"we heard a very loud sound, the first time i heard something that loud," said lola saadi, who lives in parkway towers not far from the river edge.

police said their original reports were that something appeared to be hitting the water just before 10 p.M. in the area of the ottawa river parkway near the britannia yacht club and the deschenes rapids.

a search crew monday night spotted something in the water and police tuesday were investigating to see if it was anything significant. otherwise, there is no physical evidence of an aircraft crash.

const. alain boucher, spokesman for ottawa police, said there were enough credible reports to send rescue and recovery resources to the river.

just before noon wednesday, police were preparing to send out sonar equipment. the river in the area is between four feet and about 23 feet.

this morning fire department boats, as well as the ottawa police marine unit, joined by gatineau police, are involved in the search. ottawa police weren't sure if they would be able to send divers in because the current might be too strong. officers do have an underwater camera on the boat.

other witnesses offered varying thoughts about what they saw and heard.

"around 10 p.M. i heard a noise sounded like a loud bang," said bill fung, who lives along mcewen st. overlooking the ottawa river parkway. "my roommate said that could be an explosion from fireworks."

"i too heard a very loud bang preceded by a brief whistling noise which made me think, at first, that it was fireworks," said jeffrey vachon, who lives near the river in aylmer. "however, i strongly suspect that what occurred was not a plane crash but rather a meteroite hitting somewhere near the deschenes rapids/ottawa river area."

he said the noises were so loud it sounded "as if it happened next door from my home."

paramedics at the scene last night during the first search said they had multiple eyewitnesses report they heard a big bang and saw an explosion over the water.
content.summary: Here is write up from toronto sun......

content.detailedDescription:
For the second time in 2 months a star like object has bless our airspace.
i was watering the yard and had notice what looked like the star we normaly see in the south. i was about to look away and then noticed it moving. i would say from horizon(north) to horizon(south) it took aprox 40 seconds.It looked like a bright star moving. there were no fed required wing light or strobes. the other time was for east to west
right over my home. anyway i am still a sceptic, untill they knock on my door and say yo.
content.summary: Star like object

content.detailedDescription: Last evening, my husband and i took our dog out as usual before bed. as i do most nights, i walked out of our garage and looked up at the sky.  to the west, i saw an orange round object coming across the sky from the west heading toward the east. it flew in a straight line. i asked my husband "what is that?" after about 10 seconds, he replied "i have no idea". the object moved across the sky at about the same speed as a passenger jet that we see often.  we moved onto our front lawn to watch it until after about a minute, it just seemed to disappear in the night sky. we thought at first it might be a jet on fire. when it kept traveling in a straight line, we knew it couldn't have been. within a few minutes, in the western sky, we saw an object falling at a fast rate of speed that was white, moving from south to north and disappearing. this round object was leaving a contrail behind it. needless to say, it was an interesting few minutes.
content.summary: Round orange orb flying from west to east, no sound

content.detailedDescription: It was the fourth of july. the first ufo we didnt think anything of. we thought i was a fire work that never went out. then another one came... the party and i thought perhaps it was a plane. then we saw another!!! i knew it was something strange. so then i started getting scared... it started to settle down these all didnt come at once. it was about a 15 minute duration between each ufo. the scariest one was thee last... there were 3 ufo's. all the same as described above, but in a perfect triangle. they just glided across the sky. were we all scared and weirded out...A ll it did was glide across the sky. we lost sight of it because it just glided across until we couldnt see it no more
content.summary: Saw 6 ufo's that were red-ish orange color

content.detailedDescription: So im starting to feel kind of weird cause another craft flew above my home tonight. first of all i was outside at about 830 and we were watching yet another batch of probably 30 different military craft in the skies again here in tucson. only one commercial jet was seem heading west. i thought why so many of them? they were all heading east and one veered off course and headed our way. it got right above our house and ejected some luminous object which flared and disappeared. all the planes flew on and there were none for about 5 minutes. out of nowhere an object came from above the apartment i live in from the southwest and flew pretty much above us. it looked like a saucer shaped  object. the bottom was illuminated and orange hue from the city lights below. below the object a few meters were these greenish dancing lights. they did not reflect on the craft which flew a steady rate in a straight line to the northeast beyond the northerm mountain range. the object was at an altitude of about 10500 ft since that is how high it would have to fly to clear the mountains. i watched it with my gf until it was a faint star like object above and past the mountains. the planes them returned and there were more and they were spread out across the boundries of tucson which is 25 square miles and they are continuing to circle as we speak. kinda freaking me out, ill keep everyone posted on more and try to charge my camera if this is going to keep happening
content.summary: Same guy here from arizona and we have another one

content.detailedDescription:
At approx. 9:15pm i went out on the front porch to have a cigarette and a cold drink. while watching out front into the open sky view this huge white light appeared off to the southwest and seemed to hover ever so briefly, then moved off to the south at such a high rate of speed it looked like it disappeared. there was no sign of a tail and was silent. it was way to low for it to be a falling star or meteor as far as i remember. the light was solid and was about 10 - 20 times brighter than the headlights of a large plane. it was also very low in the sky.
we see a fair amount of planes in our area and both my wife and i stood up and took notice right away. we have no idea what it was and are still talking about it. not a plane or anything else we could explain.
content.summary: Huge white light appeared, very low and silent. then took off instantly and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i was going to pick up my youngest daughter at a relative's house. we looked over to left where their house is and saw a bright light hovering near their tree line, thinking it was a helicopter.  we made a left onto their road and saw a car with their brake lights on in the middle of the road. made another left into their drive way and this object flew over my vehicle and proceeded in front of the house so quick then disappeared.  it was very low, we saw roundness with a red, green, and a blue light. it flew straight across their yard and there was no sound.  we did not see any wings or tail so i know it was not an airplane or helicopter.   something flying that low and we saw no neighbors outside.   it actually gave us chills.
content.summary: While driving down the road to our left we saw a bright white light hovering very low near the trees,  when we got up on it it flew so quick, we seen roundness and red, green, and blue lights.

content.detailedDescription:
It was approx 9:30pm est on wed, when i spotted a starlike object travelling from nw to se. this object was moving in a straight line, eventually approx 20 to 30 sec later it appeared then to slowly fade away.
as i lost sight of it, my friend on the phone claimed to have then picked it up. she claimed that it veared to the left, then quickly faded out.
*note* this object was clearly seen under a "hazymilky" night sky.
content.summary: I spotted a starlike object travelling from nw to se. my friend jessica dusenberry was on the phone with me and she eventually witnessed the same thing.

content.detailedDescription:
While camping at lake superior campground along the shores of lake superior between deer park and grand marais, we, being myself, my two children, my aunt, my cousin, and my grandmother, were sitting around the campfire making smores, when my cousin, who is a weather buff and loves looking up at the stars, noticed an orange glowing ball in the sky that looked like it was slowly descending. it looked like it could have been a meteor although it had no tail, and it wasn't "falling" at a fast rate of speed. it lingered in the sky nnw of our campground, it was moving downward for a short period of time, so we all ran out to the beach to catch a better sight of it. we noticed it was just hovering there. it was too big to be a star, but not big enough to be the moon, so we know neither of these was what it was.  we watched it for several minutes before clouds covered our view of it.

the next day we were talking to other campers who said they had noticed the same thing in the sky the night before but it was moving sideways. they also mentioned that other campers in the campground had told them they'd seen the same one that we did.

i am usually pretty skeptical about these kinds of things, but every one in my family witnessed it, and i have to say, i can't explain it, and the fact that other campers out of my family makes it that much more real to me.
content.summary: Glowing orange fireball

content.detailedDescription: I was in downtown york, pa, photographing the architecture of the york court house. i took two previous shots of the same location within 10 seconds of the one in which the ufo appears. only the third photo shows the anomaly. i remember noticing a black dot seemed to suddenly appear as i snapped the picture. i glanced at my digital camera and verified that, indeed, there was a strange black object in the sky between the two domes. i figured it was a bird and thought nothing further of the photo. but when i reviewed my photos from that day, i realized the black object was unlike anything i have ever seen. it appears far too organic to be a plane or a jet or any other kind of flying machine. i have never seen a bird look like this in any photo that i have ever taken. and if it is a bird, judging from the distance it seems to be from the dome, it would be an awfully large bird. it almost has a dragon-like appearance, with a pronged tail streaming behind it as it flies across the sky. i would have noticed such a creature soaring across the sky before taking the picture, i am sure! so, i don't know what it could be. i don't think it is a ufo in the classical sense--a "flying saucer" or some other advanced flying technology. perhaps it is a rare sighting of some other-dimensional being a la john keel and the mothman prophecies. or, maybe it's just a funky photo of a large bird in flight. if you look closely at the sky in the left part of the photo, there are circling birds, probably vultures, in the far distance. none of them, however, are in close proximity to the anomaly reported and none of them have a shape resembling the anomaly.
content.summary: The ufo showed up in a photo i took.

content.detailedDescription: 1. going to my backyard i saw 5 ufo's, being excited i ran upstairs to get my camera so at first i didn't notice the exact shape they were. 5.Feelings, i got it on tape, this is not my first sighting but this time i got it on video. after viewing 7 mintues 17secons they dissappeared. attach video sorry to long to download. third party , no , i don't know who's the third party. contact me first to release this information. thank you, john ortiz
content.summary: Ufo, video tape 7 mintues 17 seconds airplane passing be birds in view  tree in view.

content.detailedDescription: We did not notice this object when taking these pictures.
content.summary: Unknown object taken in photo.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the backyard taking random photographs with my nikon s630 camera and after reviewing them later found this picture of the airplane along with another object. 
i recall seeing the plane and intentionally took the photograph but i did not see the other object. i should have been able to see it with such a clear blue sky but the only thing i saw was the airplane.

on this particular afternoon/evening i took about 350 photographs over the course of an hour.
content.summary: I found this object in the same photo with an airplane after taking random photos of the sky

content.detailedDescription:
While this is by no means my first ufo sighting, it is the most recent.  my pseudonym is arynn, and i am a resident of moorhead, mn.  since my early childhood, i have experienced multiple abduction incidients and ufo sightings, however the incident which i will describe here is one of the few in which someone else would be able to confirm it along with me.

i was (and am still currently) living in an apartment complex in south moorhead, just off of 20th st.  it was myself and my two roommates, both of them brothers.  in this report i will refer to them as jeremy and michael.  i am still currently living with jeremy, but michael (who was the person who witnessed this event with me) has since moved out and is living with his sister several hours away from here.  

the approximate date of this incident was mid october of 2008, before halloween if i recall correctly.  it took place sometime after 11 pm, but before midninght, and the entire sighting lasted perhaps 3-5 minutes.

michael and i had decided to head out to the courtyard of our apartment for a cigarette.  the courtyard is on the western side of the building in which we live.  i remember that it was a clear, cloudless night, and we had a pretty decent view of the western skyline from where we were standing.  michael and i had been talking for a few minutes, i dont recall what about, when i saw what i at first assumed to be a satellite or a very distant airplane moving in the sky, a few miles out over fargo, nd across the red river.  the first thing that made me realize that this was not an airplane was that it appeared to be bobbing back and forth up in the air, in a north/south trajectory.  i pointed this out to michael, who as far as i know had never seen any kind of ufo in his life, and he appeared to be completely dumbfounded as to what it was.  i also noted that while i could not define the shape of the object, it looked very much like a star from the distance i viewed it at, it seemed to be rotating through a pattern of bright colors, seemingly the entire visual spectrum, plus a few "colors" that i can not really define as they don't correspond to anything that i see on a regular basis.  

now after about a minute or two of staring at this thing floating up in the sky, things took a bit of a twist.  it is difficult to describe how i understand this, but i somehow felt this object become aware that i could see it.  i felt some sort of consciousness reach out and touch my mind, and my right arm then seemed to "jump" of its own will, a completely uncontollable movement.  this startled me so much that i immediately looked down at my arm, breaking my view of the object up in the sky.  when i looked back up into the sky to find it again, i was suprised to see that it appeared to have moved several hundred yards north of its previous position in a matter of seconds.  a few moments later a very loud noise echoed throughout the courtyard, heard by both michael and myself.  the sound was very unusual, sounding like an incredibly loud meow of a housecat, but slightly more mechanical.  i quickly scanned the courtyard, almost certain something was about to attack me from somewhere around a corner (i have become quite paranoid at times due to the half-remembered events of my childhood experiences.)  when i looked back into the sky for the last time to try and locate the object again, it was nowhere to be seen.  i am fairly certain that both my arm jumping and the mechanical cat noise were both distraction techniques used by whatever it was that i saw, so that i was unable to witness its more intense movement capabilities.  i am also fairly certain that the object was not present for me, but rather for someone else on the other side of the border.  

after it had disappeared, i questioned michael as to what he thought it was, and he seemed almost as if he wanted to avoid talking about it entirely.  i have yet to see another object since that evening, although i have been experiencing flashback memories more and more frequently since then, and am having dreams about ets and ufos on an almost nightly basis.  lately after having these dreams i have been waking up with intense headaches, sometimes persisting all day.  i have been looking for answers to these questions for a number of years now, and i feel like i am getting closer to the truth than i have ever come before.
content.summary: A short sighting witnessed by myself and a roommate west of my current residence, involving some kind of psychic contact

content.detailedDescription:
Last thursday evening about 2:30 a.M, don aken got up to go the bathroom when he noticed a light shining through the window curtain.  looking out the window, he saw a self illuminating light about the size of a dinner platter hovering motionless about 4 feet off the ground of the city street outside their apartment building, approximately, 30-40 feet away. the object was motionless and made no noise but was pulsating.  

he awakened his wife, yvonne, who also saw the object.  he then called the fairbury police department because he wanted independent confirmation. a few minutes later, a police car arrived and the policeman stood outside observing the object for some time.  he then came into the apartment and talked to don & yvonne about the object.  he said something to the effect of, ���i think we both know what this is.���  he then left and don & yvonne went back to bed. it is unknown when or how the object left, but was gone in the morning.  the name of the officer is not known.


please note:  this report was submitted by mike mccord, yvonne's nephew, with her permission.  
mike mccord
1209 n. leeview drive
olathe, ks 66061
913/829-3854
content.summary: A pulsating self illuminated light about the size of a dinner platter was observed floating stationary about 4' above a city street.

content.detailedDescription: this was in 1966 during the michigan "sawmp gas"sightings.  i have never reported it before but remains fascinating to me today as it was when it actually occurred.  i was living at 4233 shreve drive at my parents home in bridgeport just south of saginaw.  time was about 10:30pm and i know this because we were gathered in the living room watching payton place.  i was eleven years old and very frightened of what everyone was seeing nightly though most sightings were to the south of where we lived.  i was setting on the floor by our front door and sighted a silent, green glowing egg shaped object moving approx. from south east to west.  the sky was completely dark, and i do not recall there being any stars out that night.  icannot estimate the distance i was from the object but i remember that it could not have been far, it was quite close and quite large, like if i held a football at arms length would look.  i watched the object until it floated out of sight.  not much to go on but felt that it should be part of the record of those most enigmatic 1966 ufo sightings.  i'll likely never know what it was but i will always remain happy that i was able to see something so unusual.
content.summary: Silent, glowing egg shaped object moving south to west.
